meanings.definition: To combine two or more numbers to find their total.
meanings.sent2: She added the prices of the items in her cart.
meanings.sent3: The math teacher added some fun by using candies for addition.
meanings.sent4: His smile added brightness to the room.
meanings.sent5: The laughter of children added joy to the playground.

meanings.definition: To include something extra or supplementary.
meanings.sent1: He added a new book to his collection.
meanings.sent2: The chef added a pinch of salt to the soup.
meanings.sent3: The unexpected twist added excitement to the story.
meanings.sent4: Her kindness added warmth to the gesture.
meanings.sent5: The colorful flowers added beauty to the garden.

meanings.sent1: Students were asked to add the numbers on the board.
meanings.sent2: The accountant added the figures accurately.
meanings.sent3: The magician added numbers magically in his show.
meanings.sent4: The artist added layers of colors to create a masterpiece.
meanings.sent5: The baker added precise measurements for the perfect cake.
